item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, January 30, 2025 at 3:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Exposed DeepSeek database leaking sensitive information, including chat history (434 points | 284 comments)
2. Younger cannabis users have reduced brain function, finds largest study yet (158 points | 105 comments)
3. Blueskyfeedbot: Post RSS Feeds to Bluesky via GitHub Actions (54 points | 21 comments)
4. An analysis of DeepSeek's R1-Zero and R1 (400 points | 162 comments)
5. SmolGPT: A minimal PyTorch implementation for training a small LLM from scratch (213 points | 29 comments)
6. OpenAI says it has evidence DeepSeek used its model to train competitor (449 points | 1224 comments)
7. Building a T1D smartwatch for my son from scratch (216 points | 31 comments)
8. Mathesar – an intutive spreadsheet-like interface to Postgres data (33 points | 5 comments)
9. Advice for a friend who wants to start a blog (74 points | 42 comments)
10. Etleap (YC W13) Is Hiring a Senior Software Engineer (SF) ( | hide)
11. From C++ to Clojure: Jank language promises best of both (81 points | 25 comments)
12. Classic Duck Hunt Game Made in JavaScript and Kaplay (25 points | 10 comments)
13. Proper decoupling capacitor practices, and why you should leave 100nF behind (23 points | 8 comments)
14. Parsing PDFs (and more) in Elixir using Rust (71 points | 10 comments)
15. A major Postgres upgrade with zero downtime (119 points | 42 comments)
16. Commercial Jet Collides with Police Chopper Near Reagan Airport – Mediaite (15 points | 2 comments)
17. Asteroid Impact on Earth 2032 with Probability 1% and 8Mt Energy (224 points | 196 comments)
18. Case Study: ByteDance Uses eBPF to Enhance Networking Performance (119 points | 12 comments)
19. Airflow – Stream media files directly from macOS to AirPlay devices (76 points | 34 comments)
20. An update on Dart macros and data serialization (117 points | 98 comments)
21. Soviet Shoe Factory Principle (92 points | 74 comments)
22. Keymapper: A cross-platform context-aware key remapper (44 points | 12 comments)
23. The 'no. 8 wire' tradition in New Zealand (49 points | 39 comments)
24. Ötzi the Lyme Mummy (2019) (66 points | 22 comments)
25. Cardan grille (36 points | 1 comment)
26. Making the video that made Gorillaz (158 points | 35 comments)
27. I still like Sublime Text (980 points | 512 comments)
28. FAA issues ground stop after plane crashes in Potomac River (6 points | 1 comment)
29. Dead Games (126 points | 44 comments)
30. Show HN: Mcp-Agent – Build effective agents with Model Context Protocol (58 points | 19 comments)
